Topic.Title: Quest Glitch[or something]: games that wont delete

Posts.EditableText:
a while ago i created these two games [they never been finished...]  a few years ago or so.. i tried to delete this one  there was no delete button ... and still a year or so passed and its still there no deletion.. i dont know what happened or why its happening. then i created a new game and that one didnt have a delete button  [this all happened a few years ago or so] and im afraid more games will eventually do this.....

could this be a glitch or something...

[i could be in the wrong  forum if i am sorry....]

Posts.EditableText:
I assumed you published them and want to now delete them??
If so, a simple solution is to publish them again but switch them to private publication.

If this isn't the case, please clarify.
Posts.HTML:
I assumed you published them and want to now delete them??
If so, a simple solution is to publish them again but switch them to private publication.

If this isn't the case, please clarify.
